column4: Hi everyone. I can't make Gutsy to work with my Nvidia GeForce 6200... I've tried everything possible, restricted drivers, nvidia-glx-legacy, glx and glx-new and envy. Nothing works. This is my xorg.conf file: http://pastebin.ca/742130
Nvidia + OpenGL, that is, of course
watch the caps lock, please
I am, marx2k
whats your issue?

I can't make Gutsy to work with my Nvidia GeForce 6200 with OpenGL... I've tried everything possible, restricted drivers, nvidia-glx-legacy, glx and glx-new and envy. Nothing works. This is my xorg.conf file: http://pastebin.ca/742130
same exact issue here, same card
my next step was going to be nvidia-glx but sounds like you already tried that
my issue is with games like Tremulous and Second Life. Everything worked fine on Feisty...
did you get any XRandR issues when trying to resize using the new drivers?
trying to resize what exactly?
: resolution
sto;; cant figure it out, huh?
no, man, I'm on top of this for the last 8 hours or so
I somehow got it to work with my 6200 GeForce downstairs
mine is 6200, any tips appreciated
It seems like running "sudo nvidia-xconfig" did it for me (and of course playing with nvidia-settings, but Im sure you did that
I'll try. Running nvidia-settings prints a lot of error messages on the terminal, while it eventually opens
Here I got tons of error messages
Want me to pastebin them?
nah Ive been at it for about 6 hours now... im going to bed ...stupid Gutsy...breaking my stupid system...
I know the feeling. Have a good rest, mate
heh :)
